## Python参考书籍

### 入门读物

1. [《Python基础教程》（*Beginning Python From Novice to Professional*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
2. [《Python学习手册》（*Learning Python*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
3. [《Python编程》（*Programming Python*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=AyIGZRtYFAcXBFIZWR0yEgdRE1ITAxc3EUQDS10iXhBeGlcJDBkNXg9JHU4YDk5ER1xOGRNLGEEcVV8BXURFUFdfC0RVU1JRUy1OVxUCFg9cHVoQMnBbDR8%2BSQJlZ1wcE0N5Gn8mWhxwa1QLWStaJQITBlUTWRUCEwZlK1sSMkBpja3tzaejG4Gx1MCKhTdUK1sRBBEAXBNTEAEXD1crXBULIlwAdVwVAhcEAB5SEAUXUgcrayUBIjdlG2sWMlBpB0xcE1EXUlMYX0dXFwIATwtAABpXAE4LEQdBBlUcC0cyEAZUH1I%3D)
4. [《Python Cookbook》](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
5. [《Python程序设计》（*Python Programming: An Introduction to Computer Science*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
6. [《Modern Python Cookbook》](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)

### 进阶读物

1. [《Python核心编程》（*Core Python Applications Programming*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
2. [《流畅的Python》（*Fluent Python*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
3. [《Effective Python：编写高质量Python代码的59个有效方法》（*Effective Python 59 Specific Ways to Write Better Python*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
4. [《Python设计模式》（*Learning Python Design Patterns*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
5. [《Python高级编程》（*Expert Python Programming*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
6. [《Python性能分析与优化》（*Mastering Python High Performance*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)

### Web框架

1. 《Django基础教程》（*Tango with Django*）
2. [《轻量级Django》（*Lightweight Django*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
3. [《Python Web开发：测试驱动方法》（*Test-Driven Development with Python*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
4. [《Web Development with Django Cookbook》](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
5. [《Test-Driven Development with Django》](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
6. [《Django Project Blueprints 》](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=AyIGZRtYFAcXBFIZWR0yEAZXHVgSBRs3EUQDS10iXhBeGlcJDBkNXg9JHU4YDk5ER1xOGRNLGEEcVV8BXURFUFdfC0RVU1JRUy1OVxcDEAFWHFwcMkxkDF0zD2tZYgZDDUAEF2wSTlh%2BQVQLWStaJQITBlUTWRUCEwZlK1sSMkBpja3tzaejG4Gx1MCKhTdUK1sRBBEAXRpTEQUXA1MrXBULIlwAdVwVAhcEAB5SEAUXUgcrayUBIjdlG2sWMlBpVBtfEAERBlAYXhAKF1QBH1McChFVVxsOHQoQDgYaD0EyEAZUH1I%3D)
7. [《Flask Web开发：基于Python的Web应用开发实战》（*Flask Web Development: Developing Web Applications with Python*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
8. [《深入理解Flask》（*Mastering Flask*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)

### 爬虫开发

1. [《用Python写网络爬虫》（*Web Scraping with Python*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
2. [《精通Python爬虫框架Scrapy》（*Learning Scrapy*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
3. [《Python网络数据采集》（*Web Scraping with Python*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
4. [《Python爬虫开发与项目实战》](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=AyIGZRtYFAcXBFIZWR0yEgRWGlwTBRE3EUQDS10iXhBeGlcJDBkNXg9JHU4YDk5ER1xOGRNLGEEcVV8BXURFUFdfC0RVU1JRUy1OVxUBEQZSHVwWMmYBUWYaVGlZYgp5I2B%2FEw8IHz92YnILWStaJQITBlUTWRUCEwZlK1sSMkBpja3tzaejG4Gx1MCKhTdUK1sRBBEAXRtYHAEVBVIrXBULIlwAdVwVAhcEAB5SEAUXUgcrayUBIjdlG2sWMlBpUR1TQVAQVFcYWBRQF1BXGlMVBxpXXR9SFgZGVwYaW0UyEAZUH1I%3D)
5. [《Python 3网络爬虫开发实战》](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)

### 数据分析

1. [《利用Python进行数据分析》（*Python for Data Analysis*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
2. [《Python数据科学手册》（*Python Data Science Handbook*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
3. [《Python金融大数据分析》（*Python for Finance*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
4. [《Python数据可视化编程实战》（*Python Data Visualization Cookbook*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
5. [《Python数据处理》（*Data Wrangling with Python*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)

### 机器学习

1. [《Python机器学习基础教程》（*Introduction to Machine Learning with Python*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
2. [《Python机器学习实践指南》（*Python Machine Learning Blueprints*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
3. 《Python Machine Learning Case Studies》
4. [《Python机器学习实践：测试驱动的开发方法》（*Thoughtful Machine Learning with Python A Test Driven Approach*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
5. [《Python机器学习经典实例》（*Python Machine Learning Cookbook*）](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
6. [《TensorFlow：实战Google深度学习框架》](https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&%3D)
